thread.title: BRIEF-Savo Solar Says Chosen To Negotiate On A Large Turnkey Delivery Of Solar Thermal System In Denmark

title: BRIEF-Savo Solar Says Chosen To Negotiate On A Large Turnkey Delivery Of Solar Thermal System In Denmark

organizations.name: solar thermal system in denmark reuters

text:
May 9, 2018 / 3:27 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Savo Solar Says Chosen To Negotiate On A Large Turnkey Delivery Of Solar Thermal System In Denmark Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 9 (Reuters) - Savo Solar Oyj:
* SAVO SOLAR OYJ SAYS SAVOSOLAR CHOSEN TO NEGOTIATE ON A LARGE TURNKEY DELIVERY OF SOLAR THERMAL SYSTEM IN DENMARK
* SAVO SOLAR OYJ - SIZE OF SOLAR THERMAL FIELD OF SYSTEM AMOUNTS TO ABOUT 20,000M AND THE TOTAL VALUE OF THE DEAL IS APPROXIMATELY EUR 3 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
